1.2.name: wordpress/abusech-httpbl-check
1.2.description:
This plugin checks if a visitor is listed on httpBL.abuse.ch. httpBl is a DNSBL which can be used to blocks access from IPs which are:

  • Known source of Hacking activities (mostly script kiddies)
  • Source of Remote File Inclusion attacks (RFI)
  • Hijacked webserver
  • Scanning drones
  • Source of referer Spam

For more information take a look at the FAQ.
